name: Kim

wishText: May God bless you with many opportunities in life! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy Birthday to you Kim! Yiee! Enjoy your day blah blah blah...
text2: That's what I was going to say to you.

replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again. -J
